allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Breath Benchmark System and Sound Engine

Features:
- Breath capacity benchmark test \(4-phase measurement\)
- Progressive pattern scaling \(75% → 85% → 100%\)
- Weekly re-benchmark prompt with radiate animation
- Breath sound engine with phase-synced audio
  - Rising pitch inhale, falling pitch exhale
  - Steady hold tone with subtle vibrato

New files:
- src/state/breathBenchmarkStore.js
- src/components/BreathBenchmark.jsx
- src/hooks/useBreathSoundEngine.js

Modified:
- BreathConfig.jsx: benchmark button + sound toggle
- BreathingRing.jsx: sound engine integration
- PracticeSection.jsx: progressive pattern calculation
- settingsStore.js: breathSoundEnabled setting

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
